title: Versailles no Bara: Episode-hen
original_name: ベルサイユのばら エピソード編
sinopse: New installment of Versailles no Bara after 40 years since serialization ended, includes new episodes centered around André, Gerodelle, Fersen, Alain and many more. Each episode tells about events that happened afterward the main story and their unknown pasts that weren't disclosed before.
